faq.question: How long should descriptions be?
faq.answer: 200-300 words ideal for SEO. YouTube indexes full description. But front-load important info—most won't click 'show more'.

faq.question: Do descriptions affect ranking?
faq.answer: Yes. YouTube uses description text for search indexing. Keywords in description help discoverability. Natural usage, not stuffing.

faq.question: Should I use hashtags?
faq.answer: 3 hashtags maximum in description. They appear above your title. Use relevant ones. More than 15 and YouTube ignores all of them.

faq.question: Can I use the same description template?
faq.answer: Template yes, identical description no. Customize first paragraph and summary for each video. Boilerplate for links and CTAs is fine.
